entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
